metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0865 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Reachable Assertion in tiffcp in libtiff 4.3.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 5e180045.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
